displayName: Happy Path - User asks back to back 4 FAQs

text: Hi, I'm your virtual healthcare agent. I can help answer your healthcare claims questions, understand your benefits, and find a doctor. How can I assist you today?

A premium is the amount that you pay for your health insurance plan. It's paid by you, your employer, or shared. It is generally deducted from your paycheck.

I can further help you and answer your questions about your benefits plan, healthcare claims and assist you to find a doctor.

text.text: What is High Deductible health plan

text:
A high deductible health plan (or HDHP) has a higher annual deductible than traditional health plans.

I can further help you and answer your questions about your benefits plan, healthcare claims and assist you to find a doctor.

A list of prescription drugs covered by your health plan, often structured in tiers which means you pay less for lower-cost generics and more for more expensive brand-name or specialty drugs.
